statements: SELECT * FROM student_reports;
SELECT student_id, progress_score, performance_score, engagement_score FROM student_reports;
SELECT student_id, engagement_score, performance_score, progress_score FROM student_reports;
SELECT * FROM student_reports WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT student_id, progress_score FROM student_reports WHERE engagement_score > 80;
SELECT * FROM student_reports;
SELECT student_id, progress_score, performance_score FROM student_reports WHERE engagement_score > 80;
SELECT * FROM student_reports WHERE progress_score < 50 ORDER BY performance_score DESC;
SELECT student_id, (progress_score + performance_score + engagement_score) AS total_score FROM student_reports WHERE progress_score > 70;
SELECT AVG(progress_score) AS avg_progress, MAX(performance_score) AS max_performance FROM student_reports;
SELECT * FROM StudentProgress;
SELECT student_id, progress FROM StudentProgress ORDER BY student_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM StudentPerformance WHERE performance_grade > 80;
SELECT student_id, engagement_level FROM StudentPerformance ORDER BY engagement_level DESC;
SELECT student_id, progress FROM StudentProgress WHERE date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT student_id, progress FROM StudentProgress WHERE progress > 50 ORDER BY progress DESC;
SELECT student_id, performance_grade, engagement_level FROM StudentPerformance WHERE engagement_level < 3 ORDER BY performance_grade ASC;
SELECT * FROM StudentProgress INNER JOIN StudentPerformance ON StudentProgress.student_id = StudentPerformance.student_id;
SELECT student_id, SUM(progress) AS total_progress FROM StudentProgress GROUP BY student_id HAVING total_progress > 100;
SELECT student_id, progress, date FROM StudentProgress WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM student_progress;
SELECT student_id, progress_report FROM student_progress;
SELECT student_id, progress_report FROM student_progress WHERE student_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM student_performance ORDER BY performance_rating DESC;
SELECT student_id, test_scores FROM student_performance WHERE performance_rating > 80;
SELECT * FROM student_progress;
SELECT student_id, progress_report FROM student_progress WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT student_id, performance_rating FROM student_performance ORDER BY performance_rating DESC;
SELECT student_id, test_scores FROM student_performance WHERE performance_rating > 80;
SELECT student_id, engagement_level, participation_count FROM student_engagement WHERE engagement_level = 'High' AND participation_count > 10 ORDER BY participation_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_id, student_name, student_age FROM students WHERE student_grade = 'A';
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM courses ORDER BY course_name DESC;
SELECT student_name, grade FROM students JOIN grades ON students.student_id = grades.student_id WHERE grade = 'B';
SELECT student_id, course_id, interactions FROM engagement WHERE engagements > 10;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, student_age FROM students WHERE student_age > 20 ORDER BY student_name ASC;
SELECT student_name, grade FROM students JOIN grades ON students.student_id = grades.student_id WHERE grade = 'A' ORDER BY student_name DESC;
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM courses WHERE LENGTH(course_description) > 50 ORDER BY course_name ASC;
SELECT student_name, course_name, engagements FROM students JOIN engagement ON students.student_id = engagement.student_id WHERE engagement.interactions > 100 ORDER BY engagements DESC;
SELECT * FROM Student;
SELECT student_name, student_age FROM Student WHERE student_grade='A';
SELECT course_name, course_instructor, course_credits FROM Course WHERE course_credits > 3;
SELECT enrollment_id, student_id, course_id, enrollment_date FROM Enrollment WHERE enrollment_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT assignment_title, assignment_due_date, assignment_max_score FROM Assignment WHERE course_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM Student WHERE student_age > 20 AND student_grade = 'A';
SELECT course_name, course_instructor, course_credits FROM Course WHERE course_credits >= 3 ORDER BY course_name DESC;
SELECT student_name, course_name, score FROM Student s JOIN Score sc ON s.student_id = sc.student_id JOIN Assignment a ON sc.assignment_id = a.assignment_id WHERE score >= 90 ORDER BY score DESC;

SELECT student_name, course_name, assignment_title, submission_date FROM Student s JOIN Score sc ON s.student_id = sc.student_id JOIN Assignment a ON sc.assignment_id = a.assignment_id WHERE submission_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY submission_date ASC;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT student_id) AS total_students, AVG(score) AS avg_score FROM Score;
